about_the_game:
Summary - Idler Gameplay

In Cafe Maid serve your guests' needs in your own idle café. Your harem of cute anime maid girls earns you money even while you are shaving or watching your favorite movies, and when you come back, you can spend all that to make your cafe the biggest success around the globe. The game scales almost infinitely.

Grow your business through managing cute maid girls, deploying them in your cafe to serve your guests. As your business grows, more girls join. Flirt with them, get to know them deeper through engaging conversations, watch them open up, and change for the better (or worse) because of you.

Key Features

Chill Idle Gameplay

An enjoyable fusion of idle & clicker gameplay, allowing you to wind down a bit. Cafe Maid will not ask much of you, allowing you to focus on the girls and their stories while their business progresses on its own.

Upgrade Your Company

Once reaching a high collective level, sell your company to an investor for profits, and start over with a new girl added to the team. Spend the profit you earned on brand strategies, raising the girl's efficiency while working in the cafe. Through your previous successes your consequent businesses earn more coins, and attract more guests to be entertained.

Tasks and Achievements

An endless rotation of random tasks around the cafe will keep you busy, earning you extra rewards, such as fresh look for the girls and the cafe, gifts to give to the girls and more. In game achievements reward your mileage, allowing you to access great rewards through earned tickets.

Managing
Hire the cutest maids, selecting from a large variety, starting with your tsundere stepsister: a punk singer, an aspiring pie cook, a classic twintailed maid, a seductive fox girl and more. Set the girls up to meet the guests' needs, whether it's preparing and serving cakes and drinks, dancing and singing for them and more.

Flirting

Flirt with any and all of the maid girls of your cafe, earning their friendship and love beyond the role of being their boss. Give them gifts, take them on dates, flatter and tease them; each girl reacts differently, and their true nature reveals itself as you talk to them, but so will they reveal your true nature.

Flirt Scenes

At the end of each story chapter when flirting with the girls, you will rewarded cute scenes with the girls, where you got to know their mannerisms and nature better, outside of the cafe's environment.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL® Pentium Dual Core G3250
  • Graphics: Any with dx11 support
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9c compliant

short_description: Start your very own idle maid cafe, filling your staff with cute anime girls. Flirt with the girls, win their hearts, dress them up in the cutest outfits... Once set in motion, your business grows even while you are away.
